description: Turns Off the Screen and then back on in a second.

Yes! U are also correct.
Single click turns off the monitor for one second before it lights up again.
 
Double-click works. 
Key press / Mouse move re-awakens the monitor!

Good app to save power!

Kudos.

5-Star could be given if right-click presented preferences.
summary: Re Muhammad -- Double Click keeps it of for me
